meanings.definition: A pattern of broken checks or abstract four-pointed shapes, typically used in textiles.
meanings.sent1: The houndstooth design on the scarf was black and white.
meanings.sent2: She wore a stylish houndstooth coat to the party.
meanings.sent3: The houndstooth pattern on the socks made them look like little puzzles.
meanings.sent4: The houndstooth fabric was like a patchwork of tiny triangles.
meanings.sent5: The houndstooth print stood out among the plain fabrics in the store.

meanings.sent1: The detective would houndstooth the suspect until he confessed.
meanings.sent2: The paparazzi would houndstooth the celebrity for a photo.
meanings.sent3: The persistent salesman would houndstooth his customers until they bought something.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her past mistakes would houndstooth her mind at night.
meanings.sent5: The worries would houndstooth her thoughts like a pack of relentless wolves.
